scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:dump && npm run clean:logs
scripts.dev:db:client: npm run dev:env -- docker-compose run --rm db_client
scripts.dev:db:dump: npm run dev:env -- docker-compose run --rm --entrypoint "/bin/sh" db_client -c /var/lib/postgresql/data/tools/dump.bash
scripts.dev:db:restore: npm run dev:env -- docker-compose run --rm --entrypoint "/bin/sh" db_client -c /var/lib/postgresql/data/tools/restore.bash
scripts.dev:kysely: npm run build && npm run dev:env -- kysely --cwd=dist
scripts.dev:kysely:migrate: npm run dev:kysely migrate:latest -- --debug && npm run dev:kysely:codegen
scripts.prod:db:client: npm run prod:env -- docker-compose run -it db_client
scripts.prod:db:dump: npm run prod:env -- docker-compose run --rm --entrypoint "/bin/sh" db_client -c /var/lib/postgresql/data/tools/dump.bash
scripts.prod:db:restore: npm run prod:env -- docker-compose run --rm --entrypoint "/bin/sh" db_client -c /var/lib/postgresql/data/tools/restore.bash
scripts.prod:kysely: npm run build && npm run prod:env -- kysely --cwd=dist
scripts.prod:kysely:migrate: npm run prod:kysely migrate:latest && npm run prod:kysely:codegen
